title: INVENTORY / MAP OF MARTINAISE
description: because the map is possibly a readable items, it might need some sort of an interaction dialogue?

dialogueTree.title: Tourist map of Martinaise: "The worn map features the patchwork..."
dialogueTree.english: The worn map features the patchwork grid of the streets of Martinaise, with directions to appropriately *tourist-y* locations. Year '48 resides on the upper-right corner.
dialogueTree.polish: Na mocno zużytej mapie widnieje siatka martyneskich ulic oraz wskazówki dotarcia do odpowiednio *atrakcyjnych turystycznie* miejsc. W prawym górnym rogu widnieje data – rok 48.
dialogueTree.belarusian: На моцна зношанай мапе адлюстравана сетка марцыянскіх вуліц і ўказанні для дасягнення адпаведных *турыстычна прывабных* месцаў. У правым верхнім куце знаходзіцца дата – год 48.

links.title: You: "Trace a path through the grid."
links.english: Trace a path through the grid.

links.title: Tourist map of Martinaise: "Your finger moves through the vario..."
links.english: Your finger moves through the various streets, across Rue de Saint-Ghislaine and Rue Saint-Cispare, over Saint-Brune and Martinaise North...
links.polish: Twój palec przesuwa się po rozmaitych ulicach – przez Rue de Saint-Ghislaine i Rue Saint-Cispare na Saint-Brune, ku Północnemu Martinaise...
links.belarusian: Твой палец слізгае па розных вуліцах – праз Rue de Saint-Ghislaine і Rue Saint-Cispare на Saint-Brune, да Паўночнага Мартынэза...

links.title: Tourist map of Martinaise: "...finally coming to a halt on the..."
links.english: ...finally coming to a halt on the spot where you are currently standing, although the map gives no such indication itself.
links.polish: ...aby wreszcie zatrzymać się w miejscu, w którym obecnie stoisz. Choć na mapie nie jest to oznaczone.
links.belarusian: ...каб нарэшце спыніцца ў месцы, дзе ты зараз стаіш. Хоць на карце гэта не пазначана.

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "For a more detailed view of the Map..."
links.english: For a more detailed view of the Map, go to your JOURNAL and select the MAP tab.
links.polish: Aby zobaczyć mapę bardziej szczegółowo, przejdź do DZIENNIKA i wybierz zakładkę MAPY.
links.belarusian: Каб убачыць карту больш падрабязна, перайдзіце да ДЗЁННІКА і выберыце ўкладку КАРТЫ.
